title: maracitivEmO
sahitya:
maracitivEmO nannu maravakura rAma parama puruSa vAsudEva parAtpara


anupallavi

  dharaNijA mAnasAmbOruha bhAskara suraripu rAvaNADarihara suguNAkara


caraNam    patita pAvana nIvE gatiyani nijamuga satatamu nammiti sarasija lOcana 
kSitipati dAsharathAtmaja laKSmaNAgraja shrtajana dhAruDani nI mrduNDaka
